701296f-c.title: Bronx: Independence Avenue - Kappock Street
701296f-c.text:
Independence Avenue, adjoining the southwest corner of
Kappock Street, showing the old Berrien Pouse. It anutedates
the American RevoCution and was a popular resort for
Loyalists. The grounds afford a hhagnificent view of the
Pudson Siver.
P. L. Sperr  May 25, 1937
NO RDRODUCTICNS  Views 1, 2, 3
